headline.main: 300 BULGARS FREED TO END DISORDERS; King Boris Grants Amnesty to Political Foes as Pacifying Move, Ankara Hears

lead_paragraph: ANKARA, Turkey, Oct. 3 -- Reports from Bulgaria to foreign news sources here tonight said that King Boris had issued a special order granting amnesty to nearly 300 Bulgarian political prisoners in an effort to end the disorders and spreading revolt in his country.
abstract: rising anti-war sentiment in Bulgaria grows
